# ubuntu 下切换语言

原来系统默认的是英文，这里修改为中文，解决乱码问题：

```
apt-get update && apt-get install language-pack-zh-hans
```
输入命令：`vim /etc/default/locale` 

里面原先的内容为

```
#  File generated by update-locale
LANG="en_US.UTF-8"
LC_NUMERIC="zh_CN.UTF-8"
LC_TIME="zh_CN.UTF-8"
LC_MONETARY="zh_CN.UTF-8"
LC_PAPER="zh_CN.UTF-8"
LC_NAME="zh_CN.UTF-8"
LC_ADDRESS="zh_CN.UTF-8"
LC_TELEPHONE="zh_CN.UTF-8"
LC_MEASUREMENT="zh_CN.UTF-8"
LC_IDENTIFICATION="zh_CN.UTF-8"
```

然后复制下面内容,进行替换：

```
LANG="zh_CN.UTF-8"
LANGUAGE="zh_CN:zh"
LC_NUMERIC="zh_CN"
LC_TIME="zh_CN"
LC_MONETARY="zh_CN"
LC_PAPER="zh_CN"
LC_NAME="zh_CN"
LC_ADDRESS="zh_CN"
LC_TELEPHONE="zh_CN"
LC_MEASUREMENT="zh_CN"
LC_IDENTIFICATION="zh_CN"
LC_ALL="zh_CN.UTF-8"
```

然后输入命令：`vim /etc/environment` 

在下面加入内容：

```
LANG="zh_CN.UTF-8"
LANGUAGE="zh_CN:zh"
LC_NUMERIC="zh_CN"
LC_TIME="zh_CN"
LC_MONETARY="zh_CN"
LC_PAPER="zh_CN"
LC_NAME="zh_CN"
LC_ADDRESS="zh_CN"
LC_TELEPHONE="zh_CN"
LC_MEASUREMENT="zh_CN"
C_IDENTIFICATION="zh_CN"
LC_ALL="zh_CN.UTF-8"
```
然后重启系统即可
